thread.title: Nintendo Switch Pre-Order Link is Available
thread.title_full: Nintendo Switch Pre-Order Link is Available

author: Lucas M. Thomas
title: Nintendo Switch Pre-Order Link is Available
text:
Nintendo is mere hours away from finally lifting the lid on its newest system, the Nintendo Switch. And while we're still waiting for the exact price and date from the Big N, we are right now able to share with you the correct Amazon link you'll need to use when pre-orders go live. 
THE HARDWARE 
Pre-order for the Switch hardware itself will be going live soon, and you can click here right now to jump to Amazon's Nintendo Switch pre-order page! 
We've confirmed with Amazon that this is the right link to use, so pop it open in a tab and prepare your F5 key. 
We'll be adding other online retailers' links as they become available. 
Continue readingâ€¦
